headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Stone Hatchet
content: It may be old fashioned, but you’d be amazed what a difference six inches of sharpened flint can make to a hostile takeover. To unlock this new weapon, watch out for a text from Maude Eccles to get started on a series of Bounty Target missions. Once you’ve got your hands on the stone-cold prize, complete a melee kills challenge with the Stone Hatchet to receive a GTA$250,000 reward and to unlock the same weapon in Red Dead Redemption 2.
